entry.title: The best 25+ swimming quotes that you will love
entry.summary:
Swimming is a full-body workout that's why it has great benefits for our health. Here are some best swimming quotes that will help inspire you for it.

Inspirational swimming quotes

The man who is swimming against the stream knows the strength of it. - Woodrow Wilson

A huge part of swimming …
entry.content:
Swimming is a full-body workout that's why it has great benefits for our health. Here are some best swimming quotes that will help inspire you for it.

Inspirational swimming quotes

The man who is swimming against the stream knows the strength of it. - Woodrow Wilson

A huge part of swimming for me is I love it, and it is so much fun. - Missy Franklin

When you prepare for something, it's like jumping into cold water, but you're prepared. You jump in. And you start swimming, or if you don't swim, you drown. - Rza

The water is your friend…..you don’t have to fight with water, just share the same spirit as the water, and it will help you move. - Alexander Popov

I was so surprised. Then again, I was so relaxed in the water, it felt amazing. - Pieter van den Hoogenband

A huge part of swimming for me is I love it, and it is so much fun. - Missy Franklin

The water doesn’t know how old you are. - Dara Torres

I'm just a simple guy swimming in a sea of sharks. - Don Johnson

Swimming is a confusing sport, because sometimes you do it for fun, and other times you do it to not die. And when I'm swimming, sometimes I'm not sure which one it is. - Demetri Martin

I concentrate on preparing to swim my race and let the other swimmers think about me, not me about them. - Amanda Beard

Funny swimming quotes

Only when the tide goes out do you discover who's been swimming naked. - Warren Buffett

I have often wanted to drown my troubles, but I can't get my wife to go swimming. - Jimmy Carter

we swim because we are too sexy for a sport that requires clothes.

It's amazing how I spend most of my day half-naked, around everyone and it's just NATURAL.

Always behave like a duck. Keep calm and unruffled on the surface, but paddle like hell underwater.

I don't have to swim faster than the shark. I just need to swim faster than you.

If swimming is so good for your figure, how do you explain whales?

Swimming pools quotes

We don't swim in your toilet, so don't pee in our pool

This life is like a swimming pool. You dive into the water, but you can't see how deep it is. - Dennis Rodman

I think everybody pees in the pool. It's kind of a normal thing to do for swimmers. - Michael Phelps

This life is like a swimming pool. You dive into the water, but you can't see how deep it is. - Dennis Rodman

No one learns to swim in the shallow end of the pool.

Quotes by michael phelps

If you want to be the best, you have to do things that other people aren't willing to do.

You can't put a limit on anything. The more you dream, the farther you get.

Swimming is normal for me. I'm relaxed. I'm comfortable, and I know my surroundings. It's my home.

It's cool just because I've had this dream of changing the sport of swimming and it's finally happening.

If I didn't swim my best, I'd think about it at school, at dinner, with my friends. It would drive me crazy.

I have the opportunity to be part of swimming history. To take the sport to a new level would be an honor for me. There's no better time to try this than now.

I want to continue the sport of swimming. I'm not going to give up until I think it's reached where I want it to go.

Next
